reviews.review_msg: Dr. Mistlberger's class was tough, he wasn't the most exciting lecturer and lectures were often relatively heavy and dry. Quizzes and exams were hard, while the sleep assignment gave good grades. Despite all this, I will say that I've never learnt more in a class than I did with Dr. Mistlberger.

He was nice, based on the interactions I had with him. The exams are crazy hard though, be prepared to know everything about voles, Syrian hamsters and rats. It had less to do with applying concepts, and more to do with regurgitating experimental results. Only take it if you're taking 1 or 2 classes, no more.
Teacher is very knowledgeable, very passionate about his work. Sometimes tends to go off topic. Very science/biology oriented. Sometimes can be dull, overall a good class. Decent in hardness level.
